data.description:
Cirkle VR funny goofy game based off GTAG
play with friends or something i dont know
abuse the several bugs that exist
be cirkle
circular boy

changelog.change_log: i swear final build for today :skull:

V0.36
Remade Cirkle Apartment
Remade PC
Added Numbers to The PC
Added Snap Turn
Fixed Bugs
Added Bloom
Made Platforms A Enable And Disable Button
Fixed Speed Boost
Added New Cosmetics
The Game Might Run Worse But Fuck it.
PC Version Out Now Download in the Cirkle VR Website
IF YOUR GAME CRASHED REPORT TO THE #BUGS IN THE DISCORD.

V0.35.1
fixed bug where where audio that comes from the left and right being inverted when played.
added new hoodies.
fixed the mute button.
fixed textures.
made textures higher quality.
added text in the backrooms.
addded a new npc.
added a hidden note.
added a special item only accesible to burt saying owner.
also beta tester applications are now open.
fixed multiple ways to get out of the map.
other new things.
V0.35.1
game should not lag as much.

V0.35
fixed bug where where audio that comes from the left and right being inverted when played.
added new hoodies.
fixed the mute button.
fixed textures.
made textures higher quality.
added text in the backrooms.
addded a new npc.
added a hidden note.
added a special item only accesible to burt saying owner.
also beta tester applications are now open.
fixed multiple ways to get out of the map.
other new things.

V0.34
Some new bug fixes.
added the backrooms map in city btw
fixed alot of bug fixes
added platforms no disable button cuz im lazy
added a mute button to the speaker weird ass lookin sphere on a stick
removed night.
meh meh meh  meh meh meh  meh meh meh

V0.33
some new bug fixes and new stuff.
 added more colors to cave and made it bigger.
and fixed all the bugs to get out of the map (still some ways to get out :0)
fixed bug where unequip button did not work
fixed a playfab issue
added low gravity to the water in mall.
added rain. and removed snow
removed space
added a sparkler cosmetic
REMOVED WINTER COSMETICS 
some other stuff that im too bored to tell
made when your offline instead of the model its just 2 spheres
bug fixes and made the game run better
